original_text: As for the other events of the reign of Jehoash, what he did and his achievements, including his war against Amaziah king of Judah, are they not written in the book of the annals of the kings of Israel?
korean_text: 요아스의 남은 사적과 그의 업적과 또 유다의 왕 아마샤와 싸운 일은 이스라엘 왕 역대지략에 기록되지 아니하였느냐

sentences.original_text: As for the other events of the reign of Jehoash
including his war against Amaziah king of Judah
in the book of the annals of the kings of Israel?
